ygData.subject: RE: Lullaby tip now Hymn stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: At level 20 or 24 you get an extra tick of healing that, for me, only seemed to be when I sat down. So that s 1 standing and 3 sitting. Good Journey, Sineras
ygData.messageBody:
At level 20 or 24 you get an extra tick of healing that, for me, only
seemed to be when I sat down. So that's 1 standing and 3 sitting.

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


8)-----Original Message-----
8)From: David.Lynam@... [mailto:David.Lynam@...]
8)Sent: Monday, July 19, 1999 11:27 AM
8)To: eqbards@onelist.com
8)Subject: [eqbards] Lullaby tip now Hymn stuff
8)
8)
8)From: David.Lynam@...
8)
8)>At some level your normal regeneration rate gets upgraded to 3
8)>pts/tick (not quite sure when or if this is sitting), which
8)>would put it at 19 pts/tick at L42. Sitting gives you an extra
8)>1 pt/tick, for 20 pts/tick.
8)
8)Actually, sitting doubles your natural regen rate, as a troll
8)regens 2 hp
8)standing, 4 sitting. I was curious whether or not HP
8)regeneration ever
8)increased, this is good to know.
8)
